item.title: [PI/Exion] Shop prices
item.dc:creator: @free_wayne free wayne
item.description:
@free_wayne wrote:

Okay, I know how to change the shop prices and all that, and it works.
But for example, it SAYS saradomin brews are 229 each, and the price is really 200 each, how do I change how much it SAYS that it costs? Because EVERYTHING is wrong.

I think it might have something to do with this:

public void buyFromShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot){ int ShopValue = (int)Math.floor(getItemShopValue(removeId, 0, removeSlot)); ShopValue *= 1.15; String ShopAdd = ""; if (c.myShopId >= 17) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " points."); return; } if (c.myShopId == 15) { c.sendMessage("This item current costs " + c.getItems().getUntradePrice(removeId) + " coins."); return; } if (ShopValue >= 1000 && ShopValue < 1000000) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)"; } else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) { ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)"; } c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }

Read full topic
